ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ischanged(RW_Sanction_Status__c), ischanged(RW_Sanction_Amount__c), ischanged(RW_Sanction_Date__c), ischanged(RW_Loan_Account_Number__c) ), OR( And( ISPICKVAL(RW_Sanction_Status__c , "Loan Sanctioned"), OR( ISBLANK(RW_Sanction_Date__c), ISBLANK(RW_Loan_Account_Number__c), ISBLANK(RW_Sanction_Amount__c) ) ), AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(RW_Sanction_Status__c , "Loan Sanctioned")), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(RW_Sanction_Date__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(RW_Loan_Account_Number__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(RW_Sanction_Amount__c)) ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Either of Sanction Date, Sanction Status, Loan Account Number OR Sanction Amount is blank.
